description.text:
If we plan on visiting the $(b;autumn)Autumn Court$() we should prepare a home cooked meal!
They are very keen on those traditions!

So can you cook? 
We should make something special....
Something they never had...something typically human!

A $(b;spring)Hamburger$()? 
That sounds weird? Are you sure it will do?
You know how to $(b;spring)craft$() the best Hamburger in the Feywild?
Im convinced! 

I want one too!!
